timeline.bodyText: This is adding maps randomly, it'd be nice if it added maps based on the vote-selection logic of scores and weights
timeline.author: Pablete1234

replies.bodyText: That’s a really good idea. I’ll look into switching this logic around later today 👍
replies.author: applenick

replies.bodyText: Can we just auto-fill for the user? Why require them to fill?
replies.author: Electroid

replies.bodyText:
It's just an issue of how vote modifying commands were approached, it was discussed in #540 here. It would be expected that if you just add a map to the vote it would "force" one map and keep the other 4 random. Instead, what vote managing commands do, is expect you to select 2-5 options for the user to pick from. Some form of a "setnext between this options".
I think vote commands should always replace options of whatever vote will be held next, and maybe optionally make it so it makes the vote only the maps added via command, but i heavily doubt that will ever be used (wich is what we currently have)
replies.author: Pablete1234

replies.bodyText: I converted this PR to a draft and will work on adjusting the logic to handle vote management as you suggested @Pablete1234 👍
